nodes.text: The Dorthus Tal Prison was a prison on the Core World of Sacorria. It was located on Dorthus Tal Island, the same island as Sacorria's capital Dorthus Tal City. It was powered by geothermal energy from a volcano. It had the reputation of being "escape proof." Thrackan Sal-Solo was imprisoned there from 18 to 25 ABY.
